script.caption: Mario and Luigi in graduation gowns and hats, standing in front of Mushroom University.

dialogue.text: We've come a long way, haven't we, Luigi?
Yes, Mario. From plumbers to graduates.

script.caption: Mario holding his diploma high while Luigi claps for him.

dialogue.text: Our adventure in academia might have ended, Luigi, but we won't stop learning.
That's right, Mario. The real adventure is out there.

script.caption: Mario and Luigi, posing with Princess Peach and friends at the graduation party.

dialogue.text: Thanks for being by our side, Princess.
We couldn't have graduated without your support.

script.caption: Mario and Luigi, waving goodbye to Mushroom University, embarking on their new adventure.
